selections.name: MASTER DANDY (IRE)
selections.reason: Ideally drawn in stall 2 for the 5f sprint at Chelmsford where prominent positioning is key. Comes off a solid 2nd at Wolverhampton (Speed 52) and a win prior (Speed 49). Consistent speed figures fit this class perfectly.

selections.name: HE'S AN ANGEL
selections.reason: Last start winner with a 50 speed figure. The main danger on form, but the wide draw (9) is a significant disadvantage over 5f here compared to the top pick.

selections.name: FOREVER NOAH
selections.reason: Drawn well in stall 3. Recent 3rd at Southwell (Speed 50) puts him in the mix for exotics at a price.

selections.name: SECOND COLLECTION
selections.reason: Veteran capable of hitting the board (3rd last out), though the wide draw (10) makes winning difficult.

danger_horse.name: HE'S AN ANGEL
danger_horse.reason: Recent winner with matching speed figures; if he overcomes the draw, he wins.

selections.name: SECRET HISTORY (IRE)
selections.reason: Standout class. Ran 3rd in a Class 2 at York with a massive 75 speed figure, followed by a 68 at Newbury. Drops into a Class 4 Novice here. Far superior to rivals on paper.

selections.name: ADALIDA
selections.reason: Consistent filly with a 61 speed figure last out (2nd). Drawn 1 is perfect for a rail trip, making her the clear forecast option.

selections.name: TABBY KAT
selections.reason: Improving type, hit a 67 speed figure when 3rd at Southwell. Solid place chance.

selections.name: WELCOME RETREAT
selections.reason: Has shown ability (Speed 66 in July). Returning from a break but figures stack up for the minors.

danger_horse.name: ADALIDA
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and has the rail; if the favorite underperforms, she picks up the pieces.

selections.name: DUBAI MAGIC (IRE)
selections.reason: Course and distance winner last time out (Jan 8) with a 50 speed figure. Beat the main rival (Poetic Jack) fair and square. Drawn 4 allows for a similar run.

selections.name: POETIC JACK
selections.reason: Runner-up to Dubai Magic last time, beaten less than a length. Consistent mid-40s speed figures. Will be right there again.

selections.name: UNDER CURFEW
selections.reason: Veteran with a good 2nd recently (Speed 49). Drawn 2 is excellent. Reliable underneath.

selections.name: BISHOP'S GLORY (IRE)
selections.reason: Drawn 1 but form is slightly below the top two. Place chance on the rail.

danger_horse.name: POETIC JACK
danger_horse.reason: Very closely matched with the top pick.

selections.name: JUSTCALLMEPETE
selections.reason: Class dropper. Ran a 74 in Class 3 last out and an 86 in Class 2 prior. This Class 4 field is significantly easier. The one to beat on back class.

selections.name: ABERAMA GOLD
selections.reason: Also dropping from Class 3. Consistent 70+ speed figures. A serious threat.

selections.name: STANLEY SPENCER (IRE)
selections.reason: Speed figure of 78 last time out at Southwell. In good form and drawn well.

selections.name: TWILIGHT FUN
selections.reason: Speed 74 last out. Competitive in this grade.

danger_horse.name: ABERAMA GOLD
danger_horse.reason: Proven class horse with figures matching the top selection.

selections.name: MY BOY HARRY
selections.reason: In peak form. Won over this course/distance Jan 15 (Speed 60) and followed up with a solid 2nd (Speed 56). The horse to beat.

selections.name: EDERGOLE'S GIFT (IRE)
selections.reason: Consistent runner. Posted a 60 speed figure last out when 2nd. Drawn 1 is a huge advantage over 7f.

selections.name: CHARLATAN (IRE)
selections.reason: Won two back at Wolverhampton (Speed 53). Capable of bouncing back from a poor run.

selections.name: AMAYSMONT
selections.reason: Old timer but drawn well in 2. Can sneak a place.

danger_horse.name: EDERGOLE'S GIFT (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Matches the top pick on speed figures and has the rail draw.

selections.name: TARANJERINE (IRE)
selections.reason: Proven stayer. 2nd over 2m last out with a 60 speed figure. Won over 1m6f prior. Looks the most reliable in a weak field.

selections.name: ROGUE JUSTICE
selections.reason: Runner-up last time (Speed 55). Lightly raced and open to improvement at this trip.

selections.name: ARENAS DEL TIEMPO
selections.reason: Distance winner in the past. Recent form is average but this is a low-grade affair.

selections.name: HICONIC
selections.reason: Can stay the trip, minor place money.

selections.name: LEXINGTON JET (IRE)
selections.reason: Won over this course and distance on Jan 15 with a career-best 70 speed figure. Drawn 3 to stalk and pounce again.

selections.name: GENNADIUS
selections.reason: Won his maiden over C&D recently (Speed 69). Improving 4yo with upside.

selections.name: H KEY LAILS
selections.reason: Consistent type, ran a 70 speed figure when 2nd last out. Always in the mix.

selections.name: LUMINOUS WARRIOR (IRE)
selections.reason: Won at Kempton (Speed 67). Solid form but Chelmsford bias favors the top pick.

danger_horse.name: GENNADIUS
danger_horse.reason: Unexposed and improving; could easily step forward again.
